fn.p: Competing Interests: We have read the journal's policy. None of the authors has a financial or personal relationship with other people or organizations that could inappropriately influence (bias) their work. Dr. Eshleman has collaborated on research studies with investigators from Abbott Diagnostics; Abbott Diagnostics provided reagents for some of those studies. Dr. Eshleman did not receive any funding or other support from Abbott Diagnostics. This does not alter our adherence to PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials.
